title: Conversion error defaults
sql:
select to_date ( 
         '06-MAY-2022' 
           default '31-DEC-9999' on conversion error,
         'DD-MON-YYYY'
       ) valid_date,
       to_date ( 
         'junk' 
           default '31-DEC-9999' on conversion error,
         'DD-MON-YYYY'
       ) converted_invalid_date
from   dual;

VALID_DATE  CONVERTED_INVALID_DATE     
----------- ----------------------
06-MAY-2022 31-DEC-9999
